main event: A B-47 flying at 37,000 feet sighted a long green flame coming from an object over Livingston, Montana.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 2110 MST on August 1, 1957., The object was flying at a lower altitude of 33,000 feet., There was no trace of daylight at the time of the sighting., The weather conditions were dry with a slight breeze and warm temperatures., The observation lasted for 1 minute.
witness description: the crew of a B-47 aircraft
